name: Lukas Böhres
title: B. Sc.
cv: Lukas Böhres has been a student research assistant since January 2018, funded by the DFG Initiative of Excellence. Together with Frederic Kerksieck, he is responsible for programming the CSS Lab Tools and the CSS Lab website. Having successfully completed the Bachelor’s program in Computer Science at RWTH Aachen University, he is currently enrolled in the follow-up Master’s program at the University of Mainz. His Bachelor’s thesis was presented to the Chair for Computer Animation of RWTH Aachen University in 2018 and holds the title "Optimization Integrator for Hair Simulation".
